page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER CONTINUED
page.content: {BURGLARIES}are few in Medomsley,more in Shotley.Popular items are videos, jewellery,handbags with money.They are committed mainly during the day.Each village and school has a community policeman.{Assault}is next with minor child or family squabbles often increased by drink,but there are few serious assaults.{Obtaining property {by deception}when lies are told to obtain something illegally.{Trespass} on private property mainly affects our schools which are damaged and burgled more frequently.Other crimes include indecent assaults and drugs,mainly "glue sniffing"but this is not a serious problem.Crime prevention equipment includes pocket 2_way radio with 7 mile limit,links with a central London computer provides information in 3 seconds.The Draegar Alert machine breathelises drunken drivers.
